name: Side
detailsHtml:
“Side”, 2021, 120 mins, Performance Documentary

Voluntary home isolation is to prevent contracting COVID-19, but Hong Kong has a cramped living environment and mainly co-living. People at home are like a group of people trapped in a box, colliding and rubbing against each other. This behavior reflects the contradiction of home isolation. ”The physical condition is very good, but the mental health is slowly starting to become a problem.”

自願居家隔離是為了放止染上COVID-19，但香港居住環境狹窄及以同住為主，人在家中，卻像一群人困在一個盒子內，互相碰撞、磨擦。這個行為正正反映居家隔離的矛盾，「身體狀況很好，但心理健康慢慢出現問題。」
